name: Маска тканевая Garnier Увлажнение + свежесть для нормальной и комбинированной кожи 32г
ingredients: Aqua/water, propylene, glycol, glycerin, p-anisic acid, camellia sinensis leaf extract, citric acid, dipotassium glycyrrhizate, glyceryl acrylate/acrylic acid copolymer, hydroxyethylcellulose, limonene, mannose, methylparaben, peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil, phenoxyethanol, potassium hydroxide, potassium sorbate, propylparaben, pvm/ma copolymer, sodium benzoate, sodium hyaluronate, sorbitol, xanthan gum, parfum/fragrance.
